A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie works very well as a Disney princess movie\, but not an actual Star Wars movie.  All of George Lucas fears of Disney buying his company has been realized with this movie.

Several characters do not act like their actual chatacters from the other movies.  There's a reason people keep saying #notmyluke.  Plot points have been thrown in seemingly to confuse the audience only.  If you watched Episode 7\, and pondered the many questions it raises\, including Reys Parents\, who Snoke actually is\, what luke will say or do: go ahead and toss those aside and forget they ever existed.  For this movie will so exactly the same.

In short: though well written for an average stand alone flick\, it does not work at all as a Star Wars movie.  If this is the direction Walt's company goes with for their newly purchased universe they will soon kill it.
